title: Email verification wont send, and now i cannot play the game

replies.body:
Hi Wuarthur! I'm sorry I'm so late to seeing this :(

It looks like the verification email keeps bouncing before it can get delivered. I don't have a way to see why it's bouncing, but it can be because of an aggressive spam filter, a full inbox, or an invalid email sometimes. 

Here's what I recommend:

1. Try resetting your password. Password resets will also automatically verify your email, and maybe the different email type will make it through to your inbox. Give it a shot. 

2. Change your email address. I know this one is annoying :(

Let me know how it goes!
